Welcome to sr0wx.py’s documentation!¶

sr0wx.py is a software to run meteo station on amateur band.

Station can give informations about current meteo conditions, weather forecast, meteo and hydro awarenesses, and so on. Currently, our only source of information is Internet, but sr0wx.py can potentially read informations from any source (see modules page).

sr0wx.py can speak about everything and in any language.
